website_summaries.verdict: While Ziwi Peak is an expensive brand of dehydrated cat food, you can expect the highest quality ingredients available in their mouthwateringly meaty recipes.
pros: 6 cuts of beef and New Zealand green mussels are the first 7 ingredients
Made from free-range, grass-fed New Zealand beef
cons: This is a wholesome diet that cats can’t get enough of, but it’s also a costly brand of dehydrated food

customer_reviews.title: Good substitute for raw when away
customer_reviews.text: I feed my cats completely raw, they eat nothing but primal rabbit nuggets. But when I'm out of town my gf doesn't have time to feed them 5 times a day lol. So Ziwi Peak lamb is what the eat when I'm away. They don't love it, but they do eat it when they're hungry. The poops are a bit stinkier than with raw food but it's not soft and super stinky like kibble will cause. And best of all, I weigh them when I return and they don't lose or gain weight while they eat it. Expensive yes, but I already spend stupid money on these cuties so it doesn't bother me lol
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT DIRECTLY FROM ZIWI PEAK!!!
customer_reviews.text: ZIWI PEAK is a great product if you buy it from ZIWI PEAK! Tried buying it through Amazon two different times. Both times products arrived damaged and the food did not smell right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: **********Ferret's like it!**********
customer_reviews.text: My terrible trio ( ferret's ) quickly took to this food and I love that it's what they should be eating as obligate carnivores. I actually make this food as part of a dry mixture that they eat daily. In addition to this food I also add freeze dried liver, Vital Essentials nibblets, and some Stella and Chewy's. I think this is the perfect alternative to handling raw food products. If you want what's best for your ferret's than make sure you feed them appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: muse

customer_reviews.title: Good clean food for the furr babies
customer_reviews.text: I was hunting for awhile on a clean cat food I can give to my cats with no fish. This product is great. I mix it in side another lamb flavored food. The smell is really strong that's the downside to me. But it doesn't seem to bug my cats they seem to love it! I'm happy to find a quality product that I feel I'm being a good cat mama giving my fur babies. I was nervous reading reviews of packaging being ruined and or leaking as well as cats not liking it. But for me it's great product arrived sealed and they seem to enjoy it. The smell is strong...but worth it for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: THE ABSOLUTE BEST FOOD YOU WILL GIVE TO YOUR KITTY OR DOGGY!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a food I can trust! Finally a food that is made clean and simple! No toxic ingredients. I have a orange tabby Pretzel who has a very sensitive stomach would throw up with just about every dry food. Finally he is without issue! I am so happy and my funny little princess JunieBuggie eats it too and does not sniff at it and walks away. I am finally at peace! I cannot thank you enough! It is terribly expensive but it by far the best food I have every purchased. I will look at your other products shortly too!
customer_reviews.author: HBKAT92647

customer_reviews.title: The Best Pet Food Out There
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Ziwipeak for 3 of my cats for quite a while now. 1 male eats nothing but Ziwi venison canned food, the absolute best for those who have UTI (low in phosphorus and magnesium whereas high in protein and minerals). And 2 female cats eat Ziwi Air-Dried food, currently it's Mackerel-Lamb & Beef. I had a hard time switching one of them from Orijen, she is finicky. But all you have to do is to not give up. Just try offering them nothing but this food within 30-40 hrs. Trust me, they'll give up and soon they will not be able to get enough of this. Thank you Ziwi for making such a high quality pet food!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Normally A Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm familiar with this product bc I usually buy it locally, but decided to save a buck or two through Amazon. I was very dissatisfied bc there was a lot of "dust" in the package. The bits of food are pretty little to begin with, and so the powdery buts made the contents worse and not worth keeping. Normally this is a quality product and very healthy for your cat. My cats love it. I think perhaps there was something wrong w/ the batch on the one I got.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Uh oh
customer_reviews.text: put a scoop in a bowl, my cat turned the bowl over and left the room
customer_reviews.author: marnel224

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes it but it smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: My cat's usual freeze-dried food failed to arrive so I looked for a substitute. This seems to have the same ingredients, is less expensive, still has all the good points but is air-dried. This is the first time we tried this, and I'm mixing it with a little moist food. Cat took to it right away but she throws up right after eating it at least once a week. I won't be getting this again, mainly because of the extremely strong and unpleasant odor. My 3-star rating is because of this, otherwise it would be higher.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Baruch

customer_reviews.title: Made my cats sick!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product several times in the past with good results, however, one of the packages I just got made my cats very sick. The new package was just opened and both cats vomited all day after eating it in the morning. I'm very disappointed! I still have a full package plus another unopened one. I hope I can get a refund because I don't think it's safe for them to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Christina V

customer_reviews.title: Over-rated
customer_reviews.text: My cat hated this stuff, had to near starve him to eat it. Smelled horrible and it cost a LOT OF $$$$$$, way too much. I don't deny the ingredients or the nutrition, but that stuff was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Koleszar

customer_reviews.title: A more ethical choice
customer_reviews.text: I soak this and if my cat gets picky I sprinkle some shaved tuna flakes or nutritional yeast on top of it and they eat it up. I choose this brand because I worry about the ethical source of other cat food. I have personally been to NZ and have seen how they farm cattle- very different from the US. So even though this is expensive, I just really stick to the serving size portion and keep buying because I feel better about the meat source.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Solved a lot of digestion issues
customer_reviews.text: Was feeding my 6yo cat some grain free healthy whatever dry food from petco. All of a sudden she started getting diarrhea out of the litter box and vomiting. Switched to a few different foods and nothing solved the issues until this. She eats it ravenously and hasn't had any issues other than the occasional hairball. Seems like she's happy with slightly less food these days too, probably due to higher nutrition. Only giving 4 stars cause it is pretty expensive, but still, rather pay a few extra bucks than clean up liquid poop off my bathroom floor...
customer_reviews.author: dm mm

customer_reviews.title: Crumbs...SERIOUSLY!
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves the food. However, for the price $20 for 14 ounces. I would have not expected to have a bag of crumbs. Its like this is geriatric Cat food or something. Which might not be a bad thing...if MY cat didn’t have any teeth, but she does have all of her teeth.
customer_reviews.author: KXE

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, texture, and our ferrets like it.
customer_reviews.text: Our ferrets like this mixed in with their treat mixture. Only a few of them will eat this by itself. However, it's a really high quality food for them so if you want to step a bit higher than kibble, go with this, and just blend it with some other wet food/treat type ingredients if they won't eat it by itself. The pieces are small, flat square-ish shapes, with a flexible texture like jerky (makes sense, it's freeze dried raw meat, primarily). I hear it's good for cats, too... :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful, but must taste good?
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff smells awful. But I suppose with the primary ingredients being dried fish and meat, that was to be expected. If you don't inhale through your nose while serving, this is a great choice for your cats. I mix it with my cat's normal kibble or give some to them as treats when they're getting feisty. This food is somewhat less expensive than other all-natural brands, and you get plenty of food for the cost. If you can stand the smell, your kitties will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Brewer

customer_reviews.title: My cat likes it
customer_reviews.text: My cat REALLY likes this food. Since she was started in solid food she has been eating primal raw frozen nuggets. She is 2 now and suddenly decided that she didn't want to eat all of her food anymore. I purchased this product and she lived it immediately and has been finishing all her food. I give the 4 not 5 stars because I'm not sure what to make about the high fat content. I do like the 30+% protein in it. FYI-I also tried the canned food and my cat would not go near it.
customer_reviews.author: kuma

customer_reviews.title: Cats won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: I received the package and was actually surprised at how small it was. The food appeared very fresh and sort of soft and smelled good. I thought the cats would love it. I have three cats and not one of them will eat it. I have continued to give regular food but mix in some of this food and they will eat around it. So it is unfortunate but I will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey K

customer_reviews.title: A high quality product that my cats will not eat
customer_reviews.text: Probably someone's cats will love this. I have three, a picky fancy balinese and two street cats (not picky eaters) who now live indoors. None of them will eat this, which seems odd as it smells like something cats would like. I am going to try the salmon because the concept is great and my vet recommended this brand in particular.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Cat wouldn’t eat
customer_reviews.text: I so wanted to find a quality food for my geriatric cat but she wouldn’t even take a bite. It’s expensive but I think it would have been worth it if my cat found it palatable.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaM

customer_reviews.title: Not for my cats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my eight rescued cats as a special treat to mix with their meals . It smells delicious and the ingredients are superb. However, none of my cats will eat it. I tried feeding to the first thing in the morning when they are all starving and they still refused to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Heller

customer_reviews.title: Rip-off
customer_reviews.text: Cats loved loved the first bag I bought. The 14 ounce bag was perfect. I bought the 2nd bag which was the 2.2 pound bag. What a rip-off. It was all powder and very little morsels. This is the reason for the poor review. The morsels are soft jerky like. How can something like that turn into powder. My opinion is it came from the factory like that
customer_reviews.author: Scott Smith

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Although it is intended to be fed as a primary diet, we give ZiwiPeak as a treat/supplement. Our indoor/outdoor cat LOVES it. Having originally come from a feral colony, she was accustomed to a very natural diet. To this day she still hunts and eats voles daily and rejects most people food as being "junk" so it's hard to find something to give her as an occasional treat. Forget that garbage marketed as cat treats in the grocery store. She won't go near any of it. She gives ZiwiPeak two thumbs up, however!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats won't eat it
customer_reviews.text: My cat won't eat this food. I don't think she likes the seaweed smell. I gave the rest of the bag to my mom for her barn cat and that cat turned up her nose and won't eat it either. I love the concept of freeze dried natural food, but it was all wasted because the cats won't eat it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Sunflower1

customer_reviews.title: Hard as chips
customer_reviews.text: My cats won't touch this stuff so I fed it to my dog. It gave my dog stinky gas and slimy diarrhea! I have a hard time believing it's 98% animal ingredients because I feed my dog raw (stella chewy's frozen and freeze dried) and he does well on it and his poops are healthy and compact. Ziwi peak sounds good on paper but it's indigestible!
customer_reviews.author: Ketty

customer_reviews.title: It has good ingredients but my cat wouldn't touch it
customer_reviews.text: It has good ingredients but my cat wouldn't touch it. Before purchase, the lamb can works great on my cat so I thought this dry version would do the same. I gave this food to my roommate who has a 4 months old Siamese and the kitten loves the food.
customer_reviews.author: Nola's mom

customer_reviews.title: Give your cats Biologically appropriate diets!
customer_reviews.text: My cats inhale this stuff! I work for a holistic pet food store and had my two cats on some of the other freeze-dried raw options and they would never finish their food. They come running when they hear me open up this bag! Also like that it’s convenient like kibble without being as unhealthy
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea! Cat food jerky with all their nutritional ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! Cat food jerky with all their nutritional needs. As a couple reviewers mentioned, the smell of the lamb is a little off-putting. I don't think it's as strong as any wet cat food. If you think that'll bug you though, get the beef. The beef actually smells kind of good, and not as strong. My cat likes the beef much better, too.
customer_reviews.author: Capnmcorn

customer_reviews.title: I though the cat liked it
customer_reviews.text: In a few days I went back to give him so more and discovered he had ripped into the package open and eaten all of it. That is a 5 star review from my hard to please cat
customer_reviews.author: Cecil McCecil

customer_reviews.title: Our 3 cats don't try to immediately gobble it up like they do with the Stella & Chewey's freeze dried
customer_reviews.text: I buy this to put in a hopper type feeder to supplement our timed feeders when we go away for more than 1 night. Our 3 cats don't try to immediately gobble it up like they do with the Stella & Chewey's freeze dried, but they seem happy enough to eat it. I normally feed a mostly raw diet, so I don't want to give the cats kibble when we are gone; the Ziwipeak is a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry feeding while out of town
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, finding dried raw food is difficult. When I'm at the house, I can feed my cats canned / raw food. When out of town, it seemed kibbles dry food was the only option for my auto feeder until I found this. This works in the auto feeder, and the cats enjoy it. Plus, you don't need to feed as much since it's condensed food.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: This stuff stinks!
customer_reviews.text: Wow- this stuff really smells like mussels- it is hard for me to deal with it especially in the morning but the fur babies must get what they want. My very picky cat goes bananas for this food. It is a jerky type of consistency which shows that it hasn't been cooked to death. I would feed it exclusively but it is just too expensive so I mix it in with other food. I am so glad it is available on Amazon prime! I Was going to take off a star because of cost but I do believe that the ingredients are a cut above almost all other foods ( except raw) and You do get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Bianca ReaganTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good list of ingredients, sadly made my cat ill.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved the texture and flavor. I ordered it because of the ingredient list. Unfortunately, my cat had diarrhea after eating this.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try in mackerel and lamb, my cat loves it I’ve never known him to be into dry food but he eats this no problem apparently because the bowl is empty. The smell of the food doesn’t bother me, it bothers my boyfriend but that’s his problem.
customer_reviews.author: meagan

customer_reviews.title: Foul Smell
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand and flavor before. But for some reason this delivered bag smells foul... sure enough my cat turns from it. Will think twice before purchasing it from Amazon again
customer_reviews.author: Cristina C

customer_reviews.title: Love ZiwiPeak-great for kittie food allergies but it’s very dry
customer_reviews.text: ZiwiPeak is the only brand my cat is not allergic to. Love there’s absolutely no bird products and no fruits or veggies...he’s allergic to a lot. Don’t love I have to soak it for 10 minutes in hot water so he eats it. Too much dry food is unhealthy for the intestines of our fur babies. Love the Beef dry and wet cat food.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiBuyer

customer_reviews.title: I think that from the list of ingredients it is a great healthy treat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dog food, unfortunately the cost rise was considerable but my little ShiTsu loves it, I realize it is cat food but I picked up several free samples of cat and dog food at the humane society and as soon as I came in the door, my little dog started to sniff the bag of samples. I took all of the samples and laid them out on the floor and he immediately went right for the ziwi wie peak cat food.! ,
customer_reviews.author: Carole J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Pee Yoo!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cat food as far as ingredients go, but we threw away the whole bag after only 2 days because it smelled absolutely horrendous! Like low tide mixed with raw sewage. I gagged every time I went near my cat’s food bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: My two cats doesn’t like it, a bit worst of my money. It doesn’t smell that nice and the texture is a bit too hard for my cats to chew. They just smell it and go away. I thought I would of buy it and mix it with the dry foods. But, they wouldn’t eat it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Maple Chen

customer_reviews.title: Had done lots of research. My cat is VERY ...
customer_reviews.text: Had done lots of research. My cat is VERY allergic. This food has only venison and the vitamins. He LOVES it and has no problems. I do make his food now and he is on a raw diet but have this on hand as an alternative
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit with my cat!
customer_reviews.text: My finicky cat had decided she didn’t like her food, so I gave this a try and she loves it. The thin, flat pieces of food are more like a jerky than a kibble. She doesn’t seem to have any problem eating them and it’s a great addition to her diet. The mackerel and lamb is her favorite flavor.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Completely crushed
customer_reviews.text: For two shipments in a row, the food arrived completely crushed into almost powder. Cancelling my subscription and suggest this product be removed or re-packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ali H Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Dried Meat; Cats Won't Eat
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a high quality dried meat product for cats but not mine. The price is very high and my cats both refused to eat any of it. I am using it for dog treats. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: I sprinkle this on top of kitty’s wet food and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Wish they’d like it. Is that silly? 🤨
customer_reviews.text: My cats all 4 sill simply wont touch any of the flavors no matter how much I want them to . I think maybe it’s like of smell ? Or possibly taste? I have never seen them avoid a dry wonderful good like this. If your cats can I’m jealous . This is a really great brand and method of producing dry food. Cats don’t need kibble ..really ever .
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Plotkin

customer_reviews.title: it's by far her favorite. I couldn't find it in any stores near ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this stuff! I add water, even though you can feed it dry because cats don't get much water otherwise. This is in my rotation of foods along with The Honest Kitchen Grace and Stella & Chewy's: it's by far her favorite. I couldn't find it in any stores near me, but its such a great quality and she loves it so I'll definitely keep buying it here.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and delish!
customer_reviews.text: Love Ziwi. Crazy expensive as sole food but excellent treat/meal topper. Does have a fairly strong fish smell.
customer_reviews.author: Edie

customer_reviews.title: Bothers Cat with Grain Allergies
customer_reviews.text: My cat has grain allergies and something in this air dried Ziwi Peak breaks his skin out and makes him itch. He eats the Ziwi Peak canned lamb with no problems. Disappointed because he loves the taste.
customer_reviews.author: annlw582

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: We use this with an automatic feeder, which is perfect since it’s healthier than kibbles and yet OK to keep in room temperature unlike raw food. The size also works for the feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Best cat food ever! Completely healed my cat and saved his life from all the other "Bad" cat food!
customer_reviews.author: David Heydt

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is 96% protein. It has blueberries and vitamins. I know what the ingredients are and where their from. It is good clean food.
customer_reviews.author: sf

customer_reviews.title: This food is like breast milk to your baby...It’s perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love this food. My cat loves this food. The dry patches on my cat’s paws went away. I have a lousy job that pays pennies but this food is an excellent preventative to all sorts of health issues associated with poor cat food.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarysweet

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this
customer_reviews.text: My cat gets this as a side treat each day. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gjf

customer_reviews.title: All natural but....
customer_reviews.text: I think the cat food is great...but my cat feels differently!!! She simply won’t eat it...at all.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Santiago

customer_reviews.title: 16 yr old cat will not eat it
customer_reviews.text: I had my cat at the vet and she was given this food. After 3 days of not eating she gobbled it up. I decided to buy some, even though the cost is more then I would normally spend and she won't go near it. I tried to return it but 3rd party will not accept a return. It does not smell well so perhaps that is why she won't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Astorga

customer_reviews.title: Genuine Meat but the cat does not like it
customer_reviews.text: I like the texture of the lamp and it looks great. But somehow my kitty does not enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Mist Li

customer_reviews.title: ZiwiPeak Dry
customer_reviews.text: It’s expensive is really the only downfall to this product. I think you should get more for the money but my diabetic foster kitty really seems to like it. I mix ZiwiPeak Beef with the Mackeral
customer_reviews.author: sherry holtrey

customer_reviews.title: great product... helpful with IBS
customer_reviews.text: The furry loves this food! He was having severe digestive issues... IBS Happy kitty with this food! Took about a week for him to become accustomed to the texture. I would highly recommend this for any furry that has digestive issues/allergies/IBS
customer_reviews.author: shama

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love This
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food (and they are finicky eaters). I do moisten it with Honest Kitchen Beef Bone Broth so they can get their additional moisture.
customer_reviews.author: sph

customer_reviews.title: No to Beef
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the beef flavor. None of my three cats show any interest in this. Cannot comment on the flavor, I never tasted it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O'Dell

customer_reviews.title: It runs out pretty quickly however my cats seem to love it and ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this to feed my two cats. It runs out pretty quickly however my cats seem to love it and seem more engergetic. One of my cats has early signs of kidney disease which is why I decided to try this food which is high in protein. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for raw fed cats
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old cat has been raw fed for over a year now. I bought these for treats, and for when I’m out of town. It has a very strong fish smell that lingers on your hands, but my cat LOVES this. Couldn’t get her head out of the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ziwi Air-Dried beef
customer_reviews.text: She liked this at first, but now we only use them as treats.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive to feed regularly, but excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Kitties love this. Because it's so expensive, I give as their bedtime treats.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie F.

customer_reviews.title: my cat does not want it !
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately even if it seems to be a great product health wise my cat refuses to eat it ..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: Tucker does not get sick on them and it has a good smell.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old Ragdoll Will eat them if we break them in half and add to his other food a little bit at a time. If your car is not use to eating this type of food it may take some time to grrr use to the shape and texture. Tucker does not get sick on them and it has a good smell.
customer_reviews.author: godofcreationluvsu

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution for a Finicky Eater
customer_reviews.text: Try as I might, I could not get my shelter cat of 4 years to accept commercial wet or raw food. Once they're this age, it's extremely difficult to change old habits. This is a dry food of comparatively excellent quality, and it satisfies even my stubborn dry-food enthusiast. I just need to be sure to provide him with adequate water (provided with a pet fountain, as he won't drink water that isn't moving). Considering his limitations, it's the best option out there.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: New Zealand
customer_reviews.text: Ziwi peak is the ultimate premium. Both cats did not like the dried chicken. I do not doubt the product.
customer_reviews.author: Cam triathlon queen

customer_reviews.title: My cat hated this
customer_reviews.text: I know it's subject to the feline's individual taste, but my cat hates this cat food. Fancier is not always better.
customer_reviews.author: M New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Natural, high quality, Cat likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My girl likes this but only every other day. It must be tasty, though, because when she eats it she cleans her plate. The ingredients are great. I like to cook whole foods for her and this is a close second to that.
customer_reviews.author: May11

customer_reviews.title: I like this product line for her
customer_reviews.text: My cat has allergies to everything. I like this product line for her. Just the meat no additives.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E.

customer_reviews.title: Not a Kitty Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Our cats did not enjoy this food. I don't understand the reason. I have weird cats. I did not trash the bag. They often change tastes in food.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hollins

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates this but still deserves a five star other cars love it mine is just picky as can be
customer_reviews.author: Verified buyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find quality food that is not loaded with fillers. I won't go back to kibble.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Alexandrovna

customer_reviews.title: Seems healthy and good for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Seems healthy and good for my cat, but very smelly. My roommates were bothered so unfortunately I had to switch brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Careful, my cats dont like it. But if your cats like the ingredients, try it, iis a great food
customer_reviews.text: Love the ingredients but cats dont like it, donated it to cat rescue
customer_reviews.author: Gail S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not reconstitute easily
customer_reviews.text: Fed to the ferrets like cereal, floated in the water. High quality food, and they liked it, but it was too hard to mix with their dry food
customer_reviews.author: Dessie Stack

customer_reviews.title: This is the most natural food I can find (without ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most natural food I can find (without going the raw route) and luckily my cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent food but too pricey for this old lady on SS
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: if you love your friend, here's the healthiest choice.
customer_reviews.text: I've been making my own pet food for years and modifying the recipe as I learned more about the nutritional needs of either cat or dog. That said, there was only so much I could spend, so many places I could drive to nab the best ingredients, and only so much time in the day (every 3 days ) to make a new batch of food. Thank the stars for this product which outdoes even the homemade raw stuff...air dried so it's as close to raw as you'll come and full of super nutrient dense organ meat and micronutrients. My cat won't even bother to cry for cooked salmon or turkey anymore.
customer_reviews.author: sissopher

customer_reviews.title: Soso
customer_reviews.text: Nice brand but there are lots of fragments meat pieces in the bag not like the one I bought in the store
customer_reviews.author: Kkkkkkooooo

customer_reviews.title: Received opened bag
customer_reviews.text: It came in an envelope, the bag is open and tiny dried food fell out into the envelope
customer_reviews.author: C. D

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and more importantly, so does my cat! It fills him up much more than traditional dry cat food, and I don't have to give him too much.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My 2 years Yorkies love this food pls make more qualty !I hope my baby yourkies will live long life with your dog food !
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Product!
customer_reviews.text: So this is probably the most expensive cat food ever, BUT it works great for treats as it smells and tastes super yummy and all my cats come running when they smell it or hear the bag. It is extremely healthy, and highly recommended by many pet owners and veterinarians that I know, so if you can afford it to feed as their main food, I highly recommend this food! It is as close to a raw diet that you can find with dry food.
customer_reviews.author: Loni E

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I've used Ziwi Peak for 2 years now. My cat has a beautiful coat, no kibble-gunk stuck on her teeth, appropriate body weight, and best of all loves this food!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA COSSEY

customer_reviews.title: Raw diet no muss no fuss
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and they all love it. I found this when I was looking into raw diets for them, but I wanted something that wasn't so messy. Will agree with everyone else though it is a little pricey, but it's good for them and they love it so it's worth it to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: great but costly
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I started feeding my cats this they have stopped throwing up. Its good knowing this food has good ingredients but what you get for the price really suck
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ferret won't eat it Cat and dog 💓 it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my ferret and he wouldn't touch it, but my friends dog and cat love it. Ziwipeak is great for cats and dogs. Vital essentials chicken nibblets is perfect for my ferret.
customer_reviews.author: Anna V. Davydova

customer_reviews.title: Always the best pet food in the world
customer_reviews.text: Always the best pet food in the world. WE feed Ziwipeak to our two cats and one small dog. Excellent food and the pets are thriving on it.
customer_reviews.author: chihuahua

customer_reviews.title: All of our cats like these. Chewy but very firm small bites
customer_reviews.text: All of our cats like these. Chewy but very firm small bites.
customer_reviews.author: S. Breedlove

customer_reviews.title: My Maine Coon stray is addicted. It needs to ...
customer_reviews.text: My Maine Coon stray is addicted. It needs to be ground up and or soaked. Use a spice grinder, two pushes.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Á. Clotilde Isabeau

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My cat is usually not very picky, but she went on a full blown hunger strike when I gave her this food. It is nutritionally excellent, but that doesn’t matter if your furry friend would rather starve than eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Artur Szczepanek

customer_reviews.title: inedible vomit aroma
customer_reviews.text: nice idea, awful by all accounts. at least it cleared the rats.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but too expensive. I got 12 days worth of meals out of 1 bag.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: My cats loved this!
customer_reviews.text: I feel this is a quality food wish that I could provide them with this food daily. They loved it! But the cost is prohibitive since I am feeding 7 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Alioop

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks and smells like good food but my animals are not into the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: tari

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I don't hate it, but my non-finicky cat does. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Huntman

customer_reviews.title: Our two cats really like this.
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats really like this....mixed with a little kibble for when we are gone over night. It is too expensive to feed them this exclusively but is a great way to make kibble more healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: One of the best foods you can buy for any carnivore (ferrets, cats, dogs!)
customer_reviews.text: One of the best foods out there for carnivores. I feed it to my ferrets and they love it and do great on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Chase

product_meta.title: ZIWI Peak Air-Dried Cat Food & Topper Recipe - Natural High Protein, Alternative to Raw, Limited Ingredient
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Beef| Size:2.2 lbZiwi puts the best of New Zealand into our authentic farm-to-bowl products. Our gentle, twin-stage, air-drying process naturally preserves all ingredients. Our air-dried food is ready to scoop and Serve. And with no preservatives, sugars or glycerides, our food is safe, clean to handle, and a nutritious alternative to a raw diet.
feature_bullets: ETHICAL AND SUSTAINABLE: 100% ethically and sustainably sourced meats and seafoods from New Zealand's free-range farms and pristine blue waters with no added hormones, antibiotics, or growth promotants
NUTRIENT DENSE: 3 portions of raw ingredients make 1 portion of finished air-dried, meaning you will feed less and your cat will have reduced stool volume.
MAY HELP PROMOTE: Allergy relief, healthy skin and coat, improved digestion, joint health and mobility, weight maintenance

AIR-DRIED NUTRITION: Centuries-old slow and gentle air drying method naturally preserves food without artificial fillers while retaining nutrients and maximizing flavor. A great choice for the pickiest of eaters.
LIMITED INGREDIENTS: Recipes made up of 96% fresh meat, organs, and bones, as well as powerhouse superfoods including green mussels, organic kelp, and green tripe

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
